articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak
articles.title: Notion releases an AI-powered email client for Gmail - TechCrunch
articles.description: Notion Mail uses AI to help Gmail users organize their inbox, schedule meetings, find internal knowledge, and send replies.
articles.content:
Notion released Notion Mail, an AI-powered email client for Gmail that integrates with the rest of Notion’s workflow management platform, on Tuesday.
